entry.string:
kubectl apply -f deploy.prod.yml -n swm kubectl patch deployment vnpost-be-prod -p "{\"spec\":{\"template\":{\"metadata\":{\"labels\":{\"date\":\"`date +'%s'`\"}}}}}" -n swm kubectl rollout status deployment vnpost-be-prod -n swm
kubectl apply -f deploy-report.prod.yml -n swm kubectl patch deployment vnpost-report-be-prod -p "{\"spec\":{\"template\":{\"metadata\":{\"labels\":{\"date\":\"`date +'%s'`\"}}}}}" -n swm kubectl rollout status deployment vnpost-report-be-prod -n swm
